name: 林鳳儀
objective: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
schedule:
主要講授內容如下：(預計一週上一篇)
ABC and Value Chain
Week1.Ittner, C., W. Lanen, and D. Larcker, (2002), “The Association between Activity-Based Costing and Manufacturing Performance, ”Journal of Accounting Research, 40, 711-726. (**)
Week2.Shank, J., and V. Govindarajan. Strategic Cost Management and the Value Chain(**).
Week3.Davila, T., and M. Wouters, (2005)“Managing Budget Emphasis Through the Explicit Design of Conditional Budgetary Slack,”Accounting, Organizations and Society, 30, 587-608. (*)
Week4.Randall, T., S. Netessine, and N. Rudi, (2006),“An Empirical Examination of the Decision to Invest in Fulfillment Capabilities: A Study of Internet Retailers,” Management Science, 52 (1) 68-82. (*)
Week5.Parmigiani, A., (2007), “Why Do Firms Both Make and Buy? An Investigation of Concurrent Sourcing,” Strategic Management Journal, 28, 285-311. (*)
Agency/Contract Theory
Week6.Lee, P., and H. O’Neill, (2003),“Ownership Structures and R&D Investments of U.S. and Japanese Firms: Agency and Stewardship Perspectives, ”Academy of Management Journal, 46, 2, 212-225. (*)
Week7.Chen, W., and K. Miller, (2007), “Situational and Institutional Determinants of Firm’s R&D Search Intensity,”Strategic Management Journal, 28, 369-381. (*)
Week8.Wu, Y., and R. Tu, (2007), “CEO stock option pay and R&D Spending: a behavioral agency explanation, ”Journal of Business Research, 60, 482-492. (*)
Week9.Makri, M., P. Lane, and L Gomez-Mejia, (2006), “CEO Incentives, Innovation, and Performance in Technology-Intensive Firms: A Reconciliation of Outcome and Behavior-Based Incentive Schemes, ”Strategic Management Journal, 27, 1057-1080. (*)
Week10.Ashbaugh-Skaife, H., D. Collins, and R. LaFond (2007), “The Effects of Corporate Governance on Firms’ Credit Ratings, ”Journal of Accounting and Economics, 42, 203-243. (*)
Non-Financial Performance Measurement
Week11.Banker, R., G. Potter and D. Srinivasan, (2000), “An Empirical Investigation of an Incentive Plan that Includes Nonfinancial Performance Measures,”Accounting Review, 75, 1, January, 65-92. (*)
Week12.HassabElnaby, H., A. Said, and B. Wier, (2005) “The Retention of Nonfinancial Performance Measures in Compensation Contracts, ”Journal of Management Accounting Research, 17, 23-42. (*)
Week13. ,J, (2007) “Strategy, Performance Measurement Techniques and Information Technology of the Firm and their Links to Organizational Performance,”Accounting, Organizations and Society, 18, 343-366. (*)
Strategy and Profitability
Week14.Taylor, R., and K. Ulrich, (2001), “Product Variety, Supply Chain Structure, and Firm Performance: Analysis of the U.S. Bicycle Industry, ” Management Science, 45 (12), 1588-1604. (*)
Week15.David, J, Y. Hwang, and B. Pei, (2002), “The Performance Effects of Congruence Between Product Competitive Strategies and Purchasing Management Design,”Management Science, 48 (7) 866-885. (*)
Week16.Skaggs, B., and T. Huffman, (2003), “A Customer Interaction Approach to Strategy and Production Complexity Alignment in Service Firms,”Academy of Management Journal, 46, 6, 775-786. (*)
Final Report
Week17.Kaplan, R., (1998), “Innovation Action Research: Creating New Management Theory and Practice,” Journal of Management Accounting Research, 10, 89-118.
Week18.Ittner, C.,and  D. Lacker, (2001), “Assessing Empirical Research in Managerial Accounting: a Value-Based Management Perspective,” Journal of Accounting and Economics, 32, 349-410.
scorePolicy:

1.Class Participation, Presentation  60﹪
2.期末考(Closed Book)                40﹪
P.S: (1) 本課程共分9-12個Topics(請參閱課程綱要及進度)的分組報告,每組
約有2位成員。
     報告組: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 (30分鐘)
     評論組: 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 1, 2, 3, 4 (10分鐘)
     (2) 期末考得分未達20﹪以上者，學期成績不及格。
